ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents competitior product names from being entered into comments.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'FRAYMAN'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'TFG'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'COMPLIGUARD'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'TIMEKM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'TIME KM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'TIKIT'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'LEGAL55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'LEGAL 55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'ELEMENT55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'ELEMENT 55'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'CHROMETA'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'IMPRIVATE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'DOCAUTO'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'SECURITYGUARD'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'WINCWALL'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'MASTERETHICS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'WERTHEIM GLOBAL SOLUTIONS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'RBRO SOLUTIONS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'YOUNTS CONSULTING'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'ADEPTIA INTEGRATION SUITE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'BIZTALK'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'JITTERBIT'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'ADROITLOGIC'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'APACHE CAMEL'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'APACHE SYNAPSE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'ARTIX ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'AUTOMATION ANYWHERE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'FUSE ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'INFORMATICA POWER CENTER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'JBOSS ENTERPRISE SOA PLATFORM'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'MULE ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'OPENADAPTOR'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'OPENESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'OPENLINK VIRTUOSO'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'ORACLE BPEL PROCESS MANAGER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'ORACLE ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'PETALS ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'SONIC ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'SAP NETWEAVER PROCESS INTEGRATION'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'SERVICEMIX'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'SPAGIC'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'SUN JAVA COMPOSITE APPLICATION PLATFORM SUITE'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'TALEND ESB'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'TRACKERSUITE.NET'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'UNIFY NXJ'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'WEBSPHERE ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'WEBSPHERE MESSAGE BROKER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'WEBSPHERE PROCESS SERVER'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'WS02 ENTERPRISE SERVICE BUS'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'REKOOP'),CONTAINS(UPPER(CommentBody),'FOUND TIME'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your comment contains a word or words that is not accepted. If you think you see this message mistakenly, please, contact support@intapp.com with your comment so we can improve our filters.
